title: Oscars 2017: All the must-see moments

organizations.name: getty images  mickey mouse club reunion  call

text:
Photo: © Getty Images 
Moonlight mix-up 
The very last moments of the show will no doubt be the most talked about. Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway incorrectly named La La Land the winner of the Best Picture Award , before announcing the actual winner as Moonlight . 
The mix-up occurred after the cast and crew of La La Land had delivered their acceptance speech on stage. One of the producers of La La Land , Jordan Horowitz, quickly reached out to the real winners to come up and receive the award. 
Director Barry Jenkins then took to the microphone in a moving speech as the news sunk in, and shared in part, "...To hell with dreams. I'm done with it. This is true." Photo: © Getty Images 
Gold-winning opening 
Justin Timberlake opened up the award show with an epic performance of his Oscar-Nominated song Can't Stop the Feeling . The crooner had the star-studded crowd, including Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban, on their feet dancing, before sharing a sweet moment and kiss with his wife Jessica Biel. 
Oscars Throwback 
Twenty years after winning their first Academy Award for Good Will Hunting , best buds Ben Affleck and Matt Damon reunited onstage at the 2017 Oscars to present the award for Best Original Screenplay. As part of his rivalry with host Jimmy Kimmel, Matt was introduced as "and guest" on stage. Photo: © Getty Images 
Golden girls 
Oscar nominee Emma Stone , Jessica Biel , Nicole Kidman and Dakota Johnson shined bright on the red carpet in beautiful gold ensembles for the 89th annual Academy Awards. Photo: © Getty Images 
Harry Potter wins first Oscar 
Colleen Atwood took home her fourth Academy Award for best costume design for her work on Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them making it the first Oscar win for the Harry Potter franchise. Photo: © Getty Images 
Surprise guests 
Selfie-stick carrying tourists from a Hollywood Starline tour bus found themselves in the midst of Hollywood royalty when they walked into the Dolby Theatre during a hilarious tour bus skit. The star struck group shook and kissed the hands of a number of A-listers including Ryan Gosling , Meryl Streep and Nicole Kidman . Photo: © Getty Images 
Gary from Chicago 
No denying the surprised tourist was the breakout star of the evening. Gary managed to snap selfies with celebrities including Oscar winner Mahershala Ali , in addition to getting married to his fiancée by Denzel Washington. Photo: © Getty Images 
Everyone's favorite friend 
After having some fun with Jimmy Kimmel's tourists, Jennifer Aniston then took the stage to introduce Sara Bareilles for the poignant 'In Memoriam' segment. Before Sara sang Joni Mitchell's Both Sides Now , Jennifer teared up as she also remembered Bill Paxton , who passed away the day prior to the Oscars. Photo: © Getty Images 
Mickey Mouse Club Reunion 
Call it Disney or Oscar magic. Former Mouseketeers Justin Timberlake and Ryan Gosling had a reunion at the February 26th show. After opening the Academy Awards with his hit song Can’t Stop the Feeling , Justin shared a moment with his old pal, wrapping his arm around the Oscar nominee. Photo: © Getty Images 
Emma's in La La Land 
We aren't sure what made Emma Stone 's night more: winning the Oscar for Best Actress or accepting the award from Leonardo DiCaprio . As she took the stage, she first acknowledged who was handing her her trophy before going into her speech. Photo: © Getty Images 
Little Lion's big night 
After asking Lion star Sunny Pawar how he was enjoying his night amongst the stars, Jimmy decided to reenact The Lion King with the youngest attendee of the night. Sunny, who has been making quite the splash throughout the awards season, was a good sport as he was lifted above Jimmy's head. Photo: © Getty Images
